com.absio.broker.mapper

Class KeyFileMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.broker.mapper.AbstractMapper
      • com.absio.broker.mapper.KeyFileMapper

  • public class KeyFileMapper
extends AbstractMapper
    This handles all key file operations with the Absio Broker™ application. It is used for create, delete and authentication of encrypted key files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyFileMapper(Session session)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOrUpdate(UUID userId, String passphrase, String reminder, byte[] encryptedKeyFile)
      Stores the encrypted keys file on the Absio Broker™ application and protects it with the provided passphrase.
      void delete()
      Deletes an encrypted key file from the Absio Broker™ application.
      boolean doesChecksumMatch(UUID userId, byte[] encryptedKeyFile)
      Generates a checksum of the encrypted keys file and checks if it matches the checksum of a keys file stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
      byte[] get(UUID userId, String passphrase)
      Retrieves an encrypted keys file stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
      String getReminder(UUID userId)
      Retrieves a user's keys file passphrase reminder stored on the Absio Broker™ application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyFileMapper

        public KeyFileMapper(Session session)
              throws NoSuchPaddingException,
                     NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session for the mapper
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a cryptographic algorithm is not supported

    • Method Detail

      • createOrUpdate

        public void createOrUpdate(UUID userId,
                           String passphrase,
                           String reminder,
                           byte[] encryptedKeyFile)
                    throws IOException,
                           BrokerException,
                           NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           InvalidKeyException,
                           NoSuchPaddingException,
                           InterruptedException
        Stores the encrypted keys file on the Absio Broker™ application and protects it with the provided passphrase.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        passphrase - the user's secret passphrase
        reminder - optional reminder for the passphrase
        encryptedKeyFile - the encrypted key file
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a cryptographic algorithm is not supported
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when the secret key is improperly formatted
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • delete

        public void delete()
            throws IOException,
                   BrokerException,
                   InterruptedException
        Deletes an encrypted key file from the Absio Broker™ application.
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • doesChecksumMatch

        public boolean doesChecksumMatch(UUID userId,
                                 byte[] encryptedKeyFile)
                          throws IOException,
                                 BrokerException,
                                 NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Generates a checksum of the encrypted keys file and checks if it matches the checksum of a keys file stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        encryptedKeyFile - the encrypted key file
        Returns:
        true if the checksums matched
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a cryptographic algorithm is not supported
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • get

        public byte[] get(UUID userId,
                  String passphrase)
           throws IOException,
                  BrokerException,
                  NoSuchPaddingException,
                  NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                  InvalidKeyException,
                  InterruptedException
        Retrieves an encrypted keys file stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        passphrase - the user's secret passphrase
        Returns:
        the encrypted keys file returned from Absio Broker™ application
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        NoSuchPaddingException - thrown if the default padding for symmetric encryption is not supported
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown when a cryptographic algorithm is not supported
        InvalidKeyException - thrown when the secret key is improperly formatted
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting

      • getReminder

        public String getReminder(UUID userId)
                   throws IOException,
                          BrokerException,
                          InterruptedException
        Retrieves a user's keys file passphrase reminder stored on the Absio Broker™ application.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's ID
        Returns:
        the user's passphrase reminder or null
        Throws:
        BrokerException - thrown when the Absio Broker™ application has an issue with the request
        IOException - thrown when there are any IO issues
        InterruptedException - thrown when there is an interruption during rate limiting
